CHATS

Adapted from the tutorial on the p.s., it's mike blog.

To install:

  1. Install node.js
  2. Install node packages express and socket.io
  3. Start Xampp web server
  4. Copy node_modules folder to c:\xampp\htdocs\ folder
  5. From command prompt, run node app.js from the node_modules directory

Changes made:

  • Do not allow blank name to be entered.
  • Added color classes to user names to differentiate in chat window -- up to 10 different colors.
